articles.title: GQG picks up 3.9% stake worth Rs 4,242 crore in Adani Power via bulk deal - The Economic Times
articles.description: Worldwide Emerging Market Holding, part of the promoter group, offloaded 1.2% stake. Another promoter entity Afro Asia Trade and Investments sold its entire stake in the deal. The promoter group entities together sold about 8.1% stake in Adani Power, bulk dea…
articles.content: US-based investment firm GQG, which has been doubling down bets, of late, on Adani group stocks, has picked up a stake in Adani Power through bulk deals on Wednesday.According to bulk deals data avai… [+2177 chars]
